data.title: Leichtigkeit und Enthusiasmus : junge Kunst und die Moderne = Ease and eagerness : modernism today / Ausstellung und Katalog, Esther Barbara Kirschner, Annelie Lütgens
data.text:
Object Details

Author

Kirschner, Esther Barbara

Lütgens, Annelie

Kunstmuseum Wolfsburg

Catalog of the exhibition of the same name held at the Kunstmuseum Wolfsburg, June 20-Oct. 25, 2009.

"Duncan Campbell, Marcel van Eeden, Friederike Feldmann, Sabine Hornig, Julian Rosefeldt, Tatiana Trouvé, Sascha Weidner"--P. [4] of cover.

Contents

The artists. Duncan Campbell ; Marcel van Eeden ; Friederike Feldmann ; Sabine Hornig ; Julian Rosefeldt ; Tatiana Trouvé ; Sascha Weidner -- Essays. Art in motion in-between image, sound, and language : Duncan Campbell and Julian Rosefeldt / Esther Barbara Kirschner ; Images of thinking : Marcel van Eeden and Friederike Feldmann / Michael Glasmeier ; Restless interiors : Sabine Hornig and Tatiana Trouvé / Dominic Eichler ; The silent wrestling with the angel : Sascha Weidner's muted dramatics / Annelie Lütgens

Type

Exhibitions

Physical description

175 p. : ill. (chiefly col.) ; 25 cm

Place

Europe

Title

Junge Kunst und die Moderne

Ease and eagerness : modernism today

Modernism today
